ygData.subject: Battle At CF
ygData.msgSnippet: (So, IR, your wounds will now heal at a fast rate?  Guess I should bring out the big guns...) Oblitertron (Gestalt)/Defensor (Gestalt)/Demon Wulf/Flesh

To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

(So, IR, your wounds will now heal at a fast rate?  Guess I should bring out 
the big guns...)

Oblitertron (Gestalt)/Defensor (Gestalt)/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
Vehement/Chaos/Minion/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:






Oblitertron let out a grunt as the punches continued from Defensor.  "TIME'S 
UP!" he roared as he pushed up with all his might, once again unwittingly 
pushing Defensor into Maximal weapons fire, the Maximal gestalt letting out a 
yell of pain and hitting the ground next to Oblitertron.  Oblitertron felt 
something heavy go over his feet, but his solid metal foot held without a 
dent but it still hurt, but he had more important things to deal with.

---

Defensor slowly tried to get up, but fell back down.  The left side of his 
abdomen was leaking a steady flow of mech-fluid from Omega's blast.  The pain 
extended from the wound to most of his entire abdomen, Defensor putting a 
hand down to the somewhat large wound to keep mech-fluid from leaking.  He 
stood to his feet in pain, not seeing the long black barrel pointed at his 
head.

"PREPARE FOR OBLITERATION!" Oblitertron yelled, pulling back on the trigger.  
Four explosions ripped into his back, his right arm going to the right hard, 
the laser blasts from his barrel lancing out at the ground a few meters from 
Defensor.  

The searing pain throughout Oblitertron's back added onto Oblitertron's ever 
growing rage and he turned around to face the Cybertronian Fire, his scanners 
giving him information that the Maximal warship was the source of his pain.  
He raised his rifle, firing off three blasts at a certain important part of 
the CF as Defensor charged, his shoulder digging into Oblitertron's wounding 
back and knocking him to the ground.

Defensor saw the shots get off before he even moved to strike Oblitertron, 
and fell to his knees after Oblitertron hit the ground.

---

Dark Wolf roared at the missile that struck him in the back, and turned with 
a vicious growl.  He saw the numerous Maximals and the new group his scanners 
picked up coming towards the battle (The Wild C.A.T.S.).  He seperated into 
three smaller robots, each landing on the ground, Dinobot's paralyzing beams 
going by without hitting them, or them noticing it.

---

Demon Wulf stretched his arms.  "Come my brothers, let us take out these 
Cybertronians that have just joined the battle." he growled, raising his 
sword and firing off a blade missile at Liono Prime.

---

Dark Claw created a blue orb of energy in his left hand, throwing it at Dark 
Convoy (has the effect of a grenade).  In his right hand he formed a 
yellowish-white orb and threw it at Tigerhawk 2 (has the effect of an EMP 
blast).

---

Flesh Ripper opened his mouth wide, letting out three fire balls off at Lilly.

==

Chordate held a fist up and yelled out.  "YES!" He watched Oblitertron get 
hit by the missiles and laughed.  "Take that you pile of s--DUCK!" he yelled 
to Hysteria, leaping at her in an attempt to knock her down away from the 
oncoming blasts.

The weakly armored bridge was struck with the first bolt from Oblitertron and 
the armor was halfway gone, the second blast nearly blew it apart, the third 
smashed through the bridge and slammed into the only door in/out of the 
bridge, nearly blowing it open.

==

Vehement laughed as the missiles struck him and raised both arms, but he saw 
an explosion the sound of it reaching his audio receptors less than a second 
after it occured.  "Heh heh." he laughed.  He turned away from Hot Rod, but 
saw him giving pursuit to Unitron.

"Oh, well." he smiled, raising an arm and firing off an energy-signature 
seeking missile at Hot Rod's left leg.  He activated his personal comm. unit 
set to the main Brotherhood frequency.  "My brothers!  A way in is open!  We 
must seize this opportunity before it is too late.  Converge on my position!" 
he ordered as he ran as fast as he could, which wasn't fast considering his 
sixteen feet in height.

He saw the gang up on Unitron and sighed, firing off a single optic blast up 
at Lilly and raised his left arm, launching an energy-signature seeking 
missile out of the black barrel at Koj.

---

Chaos' scanners detected the mass of gunfire going off at the CF and he let 
out a whistle-like sound.  "Alright Minion, let's take 'em down." he laughed, 
the cockpit of his jet fighter mode opening, Minion leaping out of the 
cockpit.

Chaos transformed to his missile trailer mode, crashing to the ground hard 
but with little damage in result.  The four-tube missile launcher in the back 
raised, two 5 foot long energy-signature seeking missiles launching out at 
Koj.

---

Minion landed on the ground, raising his rifle and firing off twenty-three 
rapid laser blasts at Tigerhawk2.

---

Scattershot easily flew to the left, seeing the fire balls going by him by 
over ten meters, the single beam going by as well as two charges.  He saw the 
twister form, but by now he was out of its harming range.  He raised his 
rifle two of Iron Raptor's blasts hitting him in the back, sending him 
forward.  He cursed as he felt a great pain in his back and felt something 
leaking down it at a slow rate.

He turned, clenching his metallic mouth shut.
---

Nemesis watched the fire twister and sighed.  He raised his weapon, firing 
off twenty-five rapid laser blasts at Iron Raptor's legs.  "Play with fire, 
and the Alliance'll cripple you!"
